events:
Vaishakh Shukla Paksha starts from 1st May and ends on 16th May,
Zyeth Krishna Paksha starts from 17th May and ends on 30th May
Panchak starts on 22nd May and ends on 26th May

Zyeth Shukla Paksha starts from 31st May to 14th June,
Aashaad Krishna Paksha starts from 15th June to 29th of June.
Panchak starts on 18th and ends on 23rd of this month

Aashaad Shukla Paksha starts on 30th June and ends on 13th July,
Shravan Krishna Paksha starts on 14th July and ends on 28th July
Panchak starts on 15th and ends on 20th July

Punn Saath lies on 31st August and 1st September, 2nd September, 8th September and 9th of September,
Shravan Shukla Paksha starts on 29th July to 12th August,
Bhadra Krishna Paksha starts on 13th August to 27th August
Panchak starts on 12th and ends on 16th of this month

Bhadra Shukla Paksha starts from 28th August to 10th of September,
Ashwin Krishna Paksha starts on 11th to 25th of September,
Punn Saath lies on 1st, 2nd, 8th and 9th of September
Panchak starts on 8th and ends on 13th of this month

Ashwin Shukla Paksha starts from 26th September to 9th October,
Kartik Krishna Paksha starts from 10th to 25th October
Panchak starts on 6th and ends on 10th of this month

Kartik Shukla Paksha starts from 26th October and ends on 8th November,
Maagh Krishna Paksha starts from 9th and ends on 23rd November

Panchak Starts on 2nd and ends on 7th of this month,
Also Panchak Starts again from 29th of November to 4th of December

Maagh Shukla Paksha starts from 24th November to 8th of December,
Poh Krishna Paksha starts from 9th to 23rd December.

Panchak Starts on 29th November and ends on 4th of December,
Also Panchak starts again from 26th to 31st December

Poh Shukla Paksha starts from 24th of December and ends on 6th of January,
Maagh Krishna Paksha starts from 7th and ends on 21st of January
Panchak Starts on 23rd and ends on 27th of this month

Maagh Shukla Paksha starts from 22nd January and ends on 5th of February,
Phalgun Krishna Paksha starts from 6th and ends on 20th February
Panchak Starts on 19th and ends on 24th of this month

Phalgun Shukla Paksha starts from 21st February and ends on 7th of March,
Chaitra Krishna Paksha starts from 8th March and ends on 21st of March,
Chaitra Shukla Paksha starts from 22nd March and ends on 5th of April.
Panchak Starts on 19th and ends on 23rd of this month
